name: Little Duck Adventure
storyline: One day, two little ducks decided they needed a change in their lives. Never realizing what was needed, our heroes simply set out, hoping that fate itself would lead them to the right place. But without your and your friend’s help, they will not be able to achieve their goal, so you need to go on the road with them. You wouldn’t say no to these little creatures, would you?
summary: Together with your friend, help two cute ducks through many trials. Work as a team to get the big picture. And remember, communication is the key to success.
